special_abilities.name: Aggressive.
descriptions: As a bonus action, the orog can move up to its speed toward a hostile creature that it can see.

actions.name: Multiattack.
descriptions: The orog makes two greataxe attacks.

actions.name: Greataxe.
descriptions: Melee Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (1d12 + 4) slashing damage.

actions.name: Javelin.
descriptions: Melee or Ranged Weapon Attack: +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 30/120 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) piercing damage.
